𓄇 𓃮 ≠ 𓄂 𓃬 𓃭 𒈤
F9 𓄇 #bꜣ pauther pard => power potis panther paw ⋍ T3

𓊪 𓏏 𓎛 𓄇 | (physical) strength, power (of god,king) | potence
𓊪 𓎛 𓏏 𓄇 𓄇 | (physical) strength, power (of god,king) | POTENZ +++
𓊪 𓎛 𓏏 𓏮 𓄇 𓄇 | (physical) strength, power (of god,king) | POTENCE +++

𓃀 𓅡 󴩟 𓃮 | leopard 󴩟 |
𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 𓄛 | leopard | Pfaurter Parder Panther PawTier
𓃀 𓅡 𓄇 𓄛 | (leopard) skin | Perser(cat) > PELT Pelz Fell > wool
𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 | virility | < par™ Pfauer Power

𓃀 𓅡 𓄇 𓄛 (leo)parden Haut ⇔ 𓄞 𓂧 𓄛 fata
𓃀 𓅡 𓄇 𓄛 > pelt

𓊪 𓎛 𓏏 𓏮 𓄇 𓄇 | (physical) strength, power (of god,king) | POTENCE +++
𓊪 𓎛 𓄖 𓏏 𓏮 𓀜 | (physical) strength, power (of god,king) | ^^

𓄇 ⋍ 𓇳 Reo>Leo :
𓄿 𓏏 𓄇 | striking-power |
𓄿 𓏏 𓇳 𓏤 | striking-power |
𓄿 𓏏 𓆊 | aggressor | <?>

𓅡 is both the earliest and most widespread glyph to serve as an logogram for bꜣ, among
E10 𓃝 G53 𓅽 and possibly F9 𓄇 with the same meaning.

𓎻 𓅡 𓏱 | soul, BA | 𓅽 ⲯⲩⲭⲏ psyche : moral
